org.sm.fraxion.gui.filters

Class FilterChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sm.fraxion.gui.filters.FilterChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FilterChain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The FilterChain class provides the container for a filter chain.
    Version:
    22/12/2014
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet
